EmailTemplate.name: Missed Opportunity Follow Up
EmailTemplate.subject: Must have just missed you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Rapid Advance
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
This is {!User.FirstName} from RapidAdvance. I understand we ran into some challenges the last time we spoke, but I’ve got good news! We’ve rolled out some new products that are geared specifically towards your industry! I wanted to have a quick phone conversation to see how we can help your business out now. Give me a call back at {!User.Phone]. I will be here in the office until 8:00 EST. I look forward to speaking with you!
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} | {!User.Title} RapidAdvance®
20 West Jefferson | Detroit, MI | 48226 Email:{!User.Email} | Website: www.RapidAdvance.com
